Time_Eat.NAME: Time Warp
Time_Eat.DESCRIPTION: Every time the opponent plays 16 cards, the opponent's turn is forced to end, and you win !M! force.

curiousness.NAME: Evil Spell
curiousness.DESCRIPTION: 每当对方打出1张能力牌，你获得 !M! 点 力量。

MultiplayerTimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
MultiplayerTimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: When the enemy plays !M! cards in his turn, end his turn. Remove effect after trigger 1 times.

hexCard.NAME: Evil Spell
hexCard.DESCRIPTION: In the next !M! turns, shuffle a *Dazed into enemy's discard pile when the enemy play a non-Attack card. NL Exhaust.

strongMan.NAME: 猛男
strongMan.DESCRIPTION: 每当对方打出1张技能牌，你获得 !M! 点 力量。

${modID}:BurnTransform.NAME: Burn Transform
${modID}:BurnTransform.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a status card this turn, transfer it to the enemy’s discard pile.

${modID}:ComputeTransform.NAME: Compute Transform
${modID}:ComputeTransform.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a status card, a curse card or an unupgraded common card, transfer it to the enemy’s discard pile.

virusTransform.NAME: Virus Transform
virusTransform.DESCRIPTION: When you play a power card, transfer the first !M! status card to enemy's discard pile.
virusTransform.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you play a power card, transfer the first !M! status card to enemy's discard pile. NL Innate.

fateTransform.NAME: Fate Transform
fateTransform.DESCRIPTION: The discarded cards by Scry will be transferred to enemy's discard pile.

${modID}:DoubleSword.NAME: Double Sword
${modID}:DoubleSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! *Wound to your hand and to your enemy’s hand.
${modID}:DoubleSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! *Wounds to your hand and to your enemy’s hand.

PsychicSnooping.NAME: Remove cards
PsychicSnooping.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Pick one of the first five cards from the opponent's draw pile, Exhaust it.

StealCard.NAME: Steal from others
StealCard.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Pick one of the first five cards from the opponent's draw pile, Exhaust it, add it to your hand.
StealCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Pick one of the first five cards from the opponent's draw pile, Exhaust it, add it to your hand. This card consumes zero energy in this turn.

painSword.NAME: Pain Sword
painSword.DESCRIPTION: When you deal unblocked attack, add a *Wounds in the enemy's discard pile. Keey !M! turns.
painSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you deal unblocked attach, add a *Wounds in the enemy's discard pile. Keey !M! turns. NL Retain.

electronicInterference.NAME: Electronic Interference
electronicInterference.DESCRIPTION: In the next X turns, the enemy lose [B]. NL Exhaust.
electronicInterference.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: In the next X+1 turns, the enemy lose [B]. NL Exhaust.

ChangeOffering.NAME: Offering
ChangeOffering.DESCRIPTION: Lose !D! (10% max HP) HP. NL Gain [R] [R]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
ChangeOffering.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !D! (10% max HP) HP. NL Gain [R] [R]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

godPunishment.NAME: Nemesis Form
godPunishment.DESCRIPTION: At the end of every 2 rounds, if there is no Intangible, obtain 1 Intangible. Get the most !M! times.
